definition.name: InputOTP
definition.purpose: A customizable OTP (One-Time Password) input component
definition.description: A wrapper around the OTPInput component from the input-otp package, providing additional styling and container className support for use in authentication and verification flows.

className.description: Additional class names for the input element

containerClassName.description: Additional class names for the container element

visible: A row of input fields for OTP entry
enabled: All OTP input fields unless disabled

when.description: User types a digit in an OTP field

from.state: Empty or partially filled OTP fields

visible: OTP input fields with updated value

when.description: User pastes a full OTP code

from.state: Empty or partially filled OTP fields

visible: OTP input fields with all values filled

effects: All OTP fields are populated with pasted value

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal row of input fields styled for OTP entry, with optional container styling.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the OTPInput component from input-otp and merges class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: InputOTPGroup
definition.purpose: A container for grouping OTP input slots
definition.description: A div wrapper for grouping OTP input slots, providing consistent styling and structure for OTP input groups.

className.description: Additional class names for the group container

visible: A flex container for OTP slots

definition.visualLayout: A flex row container for OTP input slots.
definition.implementationNotes: Applies flex styling and merges class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: InputOTPSlot
definition.purpose: A single slot in the OTP input sequence
definition.description: Represents a single OTP input slot, displaying the entered character and a fake caret if active. Integrates with OTPInputContext for state management.

index.description: The index of the slot in the OTP sequence

className.description: Additional class names for the slot

initial.data: Empty slot or slot with character

visible: A styled box for a single OTP character, possibly with a blinking caret

effects: Caret is shown in the active slot

when.description: User enters a character in the slot

definition.visualLayout: A square box styled for OTP character entry, with active/focused state and optional caret.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses OTPInputContext to get slot state and merges class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: InputOTPSeparator
definition.purpose: A visual separator between OTP input slots
definition.description: A separator component for OTP input slots, typically rendered as a minus icon, to visually separate groups of OTP fields.

visible: A minus icon between OTP input slots

definition.visualLayout: A minus icon rendered between OTP input slots.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses MinusIcon from lucide-react for the separator icon.
